info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 22 at 7:05PM CDT until April 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Northeastern Ector County in western Texas... Southeastern Andrews County in western Texas... Northwestern Midland County in western Texas... Southwestern Martin County in western Texas...
* Until 800 PM CDT.
* At 704 PM CDT, a dust storm was near West Odessa, moving north at 50 mph.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
Locations impacted include... Midland International Air and Space Port, Midland, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Goldsmith, Warfield, Midland Airpark, West Odessa, and Odessa.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 8:00 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 8:00 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Andrews, TX; Ector, TX; Martin, TX; Midland, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Andrews, TX; Ector, TX; Martin, TX; Midland, TX
